name: Brainbase
headline: AI workflow automations for enterprise
description:
Brainbase is an AI workflow automation builder designed to handle complex enterprise workflows. Our customers use us to spin up everything from sales autopilots to full fledged customer support workflows in less than a day.

SMBs and unicorns choose us over our competitors because we are the only platform that combines the power of AI with the ease and robustness of an off-the-shelf enterprise tool.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:generative-ai; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:workflow-automation; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Gokhan Egri, Founder
founders.description:
Freeing up your company's workforce by automating repetitive data tasks at Brainbase (W24).

Previously Co-founder and CEO at Leo (AI grader), Harvard CS PhD (dropped-out).

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Brainbase**

Founded in 2024, Brainbase is an innovative startup located in the heart of San Francisco and is part of the Y Combinator Batch W24 program. With a compact but effective team of five, Brainbase is making significant strides in the realm of AI-driven workflow automation for enterprises.

**Mission and Offering:**
Brainbase is on a mission to revolutionize how businesses operate by offering AI workflow automation solutions that help manage complex enterprise workflows. Their platform empowers companies, from small to medium-sized businesses (SMBs) to unicorns, to effortlessly create everything from sales autopilots to comprehensive customer support systems—all in under a day. 

What sets Brainbase apart? They uniquely combine the power of AI with a robust, user-friendly interface typical of off-the-shelf enterprise tools. This blend ensures clients can automate repetitive tasks while maintaining ease of use and performance reliability.

**Key Features:**
Their offerings include a wide range of customizable templates and AI workers to assist in various tasks, such as:
- **Sales Automation:** Cold calling assistance, sales forecasting tools, and streamlining sales processes.
- **HR Solutions:** AI recruiters, employee onboarding assistants, and performance review analyzers.
- **Customer Support Automation:** AI chatbots and sentiment analysis tools.
- **Document Processing:** Tools for invoicing and document classification.

Brainbase integrates seamlessly with over 100 applications, making it easy for businesses to connect their AI workers to existing workflows. 

**Security and Support:**
The company prides itself on security—with end-to-end encryption and dedicated 24/7 support from AI experts. All data remains private, stored securely on the company's servers, which is crucial for large organizations needing enterprise-grade solutions.

**Community and Future:**
Brainbase encourages companies to join their waitlist or book a demo to explore how their AI workforce can enhance productivity. As they continue to grow, they aim to solidify their place as pioneers in the AI space, helping enterprises operate more efficiently and effectively.

You can learn more about Brainbase and their offerings by visiting their website: [Brainbase](https://usebrainbase.com). 

In a world where time and resources are precious, Brainbase stands out with a promise of effective AI solutions that not only enable but empower businesses.
